divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my drive way , at home. I looked up saw this bright object I thought it was a very bright star It seemed to hover for 3 hours and then moved east direction I Felt like i was seeing something from another world. very excited and confused. Object moved away after 3 hours. it went slow to the east and was seen all over fresno and area. multiple witness. i filmed it for an hour. it was on the news in fresno.
Summary: UFO OVER FRESNO DAY TIME MORPHING
